parameters.definition: Units of chocolate spread required to make a chocolate crepe
Units of crepe mix required to make a chocolate crepe
Units of peanut butter spread required to make a peanut butter crepe
Units of crepe mix required to make a peanut butter crepe
The minimum ratio of chocolate crepes to all crepes made
Total units of chocolate spread available
Total units of peanut butter spread available

description: A crepe store sells chocolate and peanut butter crepes. A chocolate crepe requires \param{ChocoCrepeChocolate} units of chocolate spread and \param{ChocoCrepeMix} units of crepe mix. A peanut butter crepe requires \param{PBCrepePeanutButter} units of peanut butter spread and \param{PBCrepeMix} units of crepe mix. Recently, the peanut butter crepe has been more popular and therefore the number of peanut butter crepes made must exceed the number of chocolate crepes made. However, at least \param{MinChocoRatio} of the crepes made should be chocolate. The store has available \param{TotalChocolateSpread} units of chocolate spread and \param{TotalPeanutButterSpread} units of peanut butter spread. How many of each should the store make to minimize the total amount of crepe mix needed?
